verses.text_uthmani: طه
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: طه
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṭāhā.
verses.translation: Та - Ха

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':515'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَا عَلَيْكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8434'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā anzalnā 'alaikal-qur'āna litasyqā.
verses.translation: Не для того тебе Коран Мы ниспосылали, Чтобы он стал (причиной) твоих бед и огорчений

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8435'>ةً ل</tajweed>ِّم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8436'>َن ي</tajweed>َخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā tażkiratal limay yakhsyā.
verses.translation: (Мы низвели тебе его) лишь как напоминание для тех, Которые страшатся (гнева) Бога

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7929'>نز</tajweed>ِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8437'>اً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َنْ خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8438'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8439'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8440'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعُلَى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tanzīlam mimman khalaqal-arḍa was-samāwātil-'ulā.
verses.translation: Как откровенье от Того, Кто землю сотворил и высь небес построил

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4740'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8441'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَوَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ar- raḥmānu 'alal-'arsyistawā.
verses.translation: (Создатель) Милосердный, (Кто) утвердил Себя на Троне (Вседержавья)

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَمَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8442'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ثَّرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa mā bainahumā wa mā taḥtaṡ-ṡarā.
verses.translation: Ему принадлежит все в небесах и на земле И все, что между ними (пребывает) И под землей (хоронится от глаз)

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8443'>ن ت</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7936'>جْ</tajweed>هَرْ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7118'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْلِ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> يَعْلَمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8444'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa in tajhar bil-qauli fa innahū ya'lamus-sirra wa akhfā.
verses.translation: И если ты повысишь голос, (Пользы от этого не будет), - Ему ведь тайное известно И то, (что еще) более сокрыто

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱللَّهُ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ لَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8445'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَسْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5156'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), lahul-asmā'ul-ḥusnā.
verses.translation: Аллах! Другого божества не существует. Ему - прекраснейшие имена

verses.text_uthmani: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهَلْ أَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa hal atāka ḥadīṡu mūsā.
verses.translation: Дошла ли до тебя история о Мусе

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ رَءَا نَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8446'>رًا ف</tajweed>َقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8447'>ٱ</tajweed>مْكُث<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَانَسْتُ نَا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8448'>رًا ل</tajweed>َّعَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَاتِيك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8449'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':896'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ هُدًى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż ra'ā nāran fa qāla li'ahlihimkuṡū innī ānastu nāral la'allī ātīkum minhā biqabasin au ajidu 'alan-nāri hudā(n).
verses.translation: Вот он огонь увидел И сказал семейству своему: "Останьтесь (здесь). Я чувствую присутствие огня. Быть может, от него я принесу вам головешку Иль у огня того путь верный отыщу

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا نُودِىَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā atāhā nūdiya yā mūsā.
verses.translation: Когда ж к огню он подошел, Ему раздался глас: "О Муса

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ رَبُّكَ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8450'>ٱ</tajweed>خْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8451'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَادِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8452'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innī ana rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bil-wādil-muqaddasi ṭuwā(n).
verses.translation: Поистине, Я - твой Господь. Сними же обувь ты с себя, - Ведь ты - в святой долине Тува

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَا ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8453'>ٱ</tajweed>خْتَرْتُكَ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8454'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa anakhtartuka fastami' limā yūḥā.
verses.translation: И Я избрал тебя, - Так слушай же, что Я тебе вменяю

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8455'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَ إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8456'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8456'>دْ</tajweed>نِى وَأَقِمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6518'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innanī anallāhu lā ilāha illā ana fa'budnī, wa aqimiṣ-ṣalāta liżikrī.
verses.translation: Поистине, Я есть Аллах, Кроме Меня, иного божества не существует, Служи лишь Мне И, поминая лишь Меня, твори молитву

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8457'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8458'>جْ</tajweed>زَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':6995'>سِۭ ب</tajweed>ِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innas-sā'ata ātiyatun akādu ukhfīhā litujzā kullu nafsim bimā tas'ā.
verses.translation: Уж близится, поистине, тот Час, Хотя держать его сокрытым (Я намерен), Чтоб возымела всякая душа По мере своего усердия (в делах Господних)

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَا يَصُدَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ عَنْهَا م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6065'>َن ل</tajweed>َّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3160'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَ هَوَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>هُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falā yaṣuddannaka 'anhā mal lā yu'minu bihā wattaba'a hawāhu fa tardā.
verses.translation: И пусть от этого тебя не отвратит Тот, кто не верует в него, А следует страстям своим (порочным), Чтобы тебе, о Муса, не погибнуть

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tilka biyamīnika yā mūsā.
verses.translation: Что это у тебя в правой руке, о Муса

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔـارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla hiya 'aṣāy(a), atwakka'u 'alaihā wa ahusysyu bihā 'alā ganamī wa liya fīhā ma'āribu ukhrā.
verses.translation: Это - мой посох, - он сказал. - Я опираюсь на него и кроме этого Я им листву (с ветвей) сбиваю для моих овец. В нем - польза мне и для других работ

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla alqihā yā mūsā.
verses.translation: (Господь) сказал: "(На землю) брось его, о Муса

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌ تَسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَلْقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8459'>ةٌ ت</tajweed>َسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa alqāhā fa iżā hiya ḥayyatun tas'ā.
verses.translation: И бросил он его (на землю), И тут - в змею он обратился, Что вся в движение пришла

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ‌ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8460'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُولَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla khużhā wa lā takhaf, sanu'īduhā sīratahal-ūlā.
verses.translation: (Господь) сказал: "Возьми ее, не бойся! Мы придадим ей прежний вид

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>ضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8461'>جْ</tajweed> بَيْض<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ س<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waḍmum yadaka ilā janāḥika takhruj baiḍā'a min gairi sū'in āyatan ukhrā.
verses.translation: Теперь прижми ты руку свою к боку, И она выйдет, белизной сверкая, Без всякого вреда тебе И как еще одно знаменье

verses.text_uthmani: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8462'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8463'>بْ</tajweed>رَى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Linuriyaka min āyātinal-kubrā.
verses.translation: Чтоб показать тебе (хотя бы два) Из Наших величайших Знаков

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱذْهَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7814'>بْ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> طَغَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżhab ilā fir'auna innahū ṭagā.
verses.translation: (Теперь же) следуй к Фараону, - Ведь преступил он все пределы

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ رَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8464'>ٱ</tajweed>شْرَحْ لِى صَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8465'>دْ</tajweed>رِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla rabbisyraḥ lī ṣadrī.
verses.translation: О мой Господь! - ответил (Муса). - Расширь мне грудь

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَسِّرْ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yassir lī amrī.
verses.translation: И облегчи мою задачу

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>حْلُلْ عُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8466'>قْ</tajweed>دَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8467'>ةً م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8468'>ِن ل</tajweed>ِّسَانِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waḥlul 'uqdatam mil lisānī.
verses.translation: От уз язык мой разреши

verses.text_uthmani: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَفْقَهُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَوْلِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yafqahū qaulī.
verses.translation: Чтоб речь мою они могли понять

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2930'>جْ</tajweed>عَل لِّى وَزِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8469'>رًا م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَهْلِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waj'al lī wazīram min ahlī.
verses.translation: Поставь помощника мне из моей семьи

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُونَ أَخِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hārūna akhī.
verses.translation: Харуна, брата моего

verses.text_uthmani: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱشْدُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8470'>دْ</tajweed> بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَزْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Usydud bihī azrī.
verses.translation: И укрепи им мощь мою

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَشْرِكْهُ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa asyrik-hu fī amrī.
verses.translation: Сделай участником его в моем предназначенье

verses.text_uthmani: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kai nusabbiḥaka kaṡīrā(n).
verses.translation: Чтоб неустанно славить нам Тебя

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa nażkuraka kaṡīrā(n).
verses.translation: И неустанно призывать (в своих молитвах)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':735'>نت</tajweed>َ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innaka kunta binā baṣīrā(n).
verses.translation: Ведь Ты - над нами зоркий страж

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla qad ūtīta su'laka yā mūsā.
verses.translation: (Аллах ему) ответил: "Муса! Даровано тебе просимое тобой

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> مَنَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad manannā 'alaika marratan ukhrā.
verses.translation: Ведь, истинно, и в прежний раз Тебе Мы милость оказали

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ أَوْحَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż auḥainā ilā ummika mā yūḥā.
verses.translation: Когда внушили повеленье матери твоей

verses.text_uthmani: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8471'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8472'>قْ</tajweed>ذِفِيهِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8473'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّابُوتِ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8474'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8474'>قْ</tajweed>ذِفِيهِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4971'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِ فَلْيُلْقِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8475'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8476'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8477'>وٌّ ل</tajweed>ِّى وَعَدُ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8478'>وٌّ ل</tajweed>َّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8479'>ةً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Aniqżifīhi fit-tābūti faqżifīhi fil-yammi falyulqihil-yammu bis-sāḥili ya'khużhu 'aduwwul lī wa 'aduwwul lah(ū), wa alqaitu 'alaika maḥabbatam minnī, wa lituṣna'a 'alā 'ainī.
verses.translation: (Младенца) брось в ковчег и по морю пусти. А море выбросит его на берег, И вытащит его враг Мой и враг его. Я на тебя простер Мою любовь, Чтоб на очах Моих тебя они взрастили

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ تَمْش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8480'>َن ي</tajweed>َكْفُلُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۖ فَرَجَعْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ‌ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8481'>سًا ف</tajweed>َنَجَّيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8482'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِ وَفَتَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ فُتُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8483'>نًا‌ۚ ف</tajweed>َلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِ مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4842'>دْ</tajweed>يَنَ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8484'>رٍ ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż tamsyī ukhtuka fa taqūlu hal adullukum 'alā may yakfuluh(ū), fa raja'nāka ilā ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhā wa lā taḥzan(a), wa qatalta nafsan fa najjaināka minal-gammi wa fatannāka futūnā(n), fa labiṡta sinīna fī ahli madyan(a), ṡumma ji'ta 'alā qadariy yā mūsā.
verses.translation: И (вспомни,) как пришла твоя сестра И так сказала: "Не указать ли вам, Кто может выходить и вырастить (младенца)?" Так Мы вернули к матери тебя, Чтобы утешилась она и про печаль забыла. Потом ты (в гневе) душу погубил, И Мы спасли тебя от всех тревог и наказанья, И Мы подвергли многим испытаниям тебя. И ты провел года средь обитателей Мадйана, Потом по предписанию (от Нас) Пришел сюда (к народу своему), о Муса

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wasṭana'tuka linafsī.
verses.translation: Себе (на службу) Я тебя готовил

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱذْهَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7814'>بْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżhab anta wa akhūka bi'āyātī wa lā taniyā fī żikrī.
verses.translation: Иди же ты и брат твой Со знаменьями Моими (к людям), И в поминании Меня (Усердие пусть ваше) не слабеет

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱذْهَب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> طَغَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżhabā ilā fir'auna innahū ṭagā.
verses.translation: Ступайте оба к Фараону - Ведь все пределы преступил он

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًا لَّيِّنًا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَقُولَا لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> قَوْل<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8485'>اً ل</tajweed>َّيِّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8486'>نًا ل</tajweed>َّعَلَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa qūlā lahū qaulal layyinal la'allahū yatażakkaru au yakhsyā.
verses.translation: Но речь с ним кроткую ведите: Быть может, увещание он примет И убоится (гнева Бога)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَا رَبَّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َنَا نَخَافُ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8487'>َن ي</tajweed>َفْرُطَ عَلَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَوْ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8488'>َن ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8489'>طْ</tajweed>غَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu ay yafruṭa 'alainā au ay yaṭgā.
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Наш Господь! Боимся мы, он с нами будет дерзок Иль поспешит нам сделать зло

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ لَا تَخَاف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َنِى مَعَكُم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla lā takhāfā innanī ma'akumā asma'u wa arā.
verses.translation: (Господь) сказал: "Не бойтесь, с вами Я, - Поистине, Я слушаю и вижу

verses.text_uthmani: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُول<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِسْر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3905'>بْ</tajweed>هُمْ‌ۖ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> جِئْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1930'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':770'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8490'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3443'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8491'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa'tiyāhu fa qūlā innā rasūlā rabbika fa arsil ma'anā banī isrā'īl(a), wa lā tu'ażżibhum, qad ji'nāka bi'āyatim mir rabbik(a), was-salāmu 'alā manittaba'al-hudā.
verses.translation: А потому идите и скажите: "Посланники мы Бога твоего. Отправь сынов Исраиля ты с нами И им страданий не чини. Пришли к тебе мы со знамением от Бога твоего, И мир тому, кто Руководство (Его) примет

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> أُوحِىَ إِلَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8492'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8493'>ن ك</tajweed>َذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā qad ūḥiya ilainā annal-'ażāba 'alā man każżaba wa tawallā.
verses.translation: Уже открыто нам, Что будет наказание для тех, Кто (его) ложью наречет и отвернется

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ فَم<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8494'>َن ر</tajweed>َّبُّكُمَا يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla famar rabbukumā yā mūsā.
verses.translation: (Тут) (Фараон) сказал: "Кто вам Господь, о Муса

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ رَبُّنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8495'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ هَدَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla rabbunal-lażī a'ṭā kulla syai'in khalqahū ṡumma hadā.
verses.translation: Муса ответил: "Господь наш - Тот, Кто каждой (сотворенной) твари Придал породу, форму, а потом (Для пребывания) назначил Руководство

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8496'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8497'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُولَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla famā bālul-qurūnil-ūlā.
verses.translation: А как же (дело будет обстоять) Со (множеством) ушедших поколений, (К которым это Руководство не пришло)? - Спросил (их Фараон)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ رَبِّى فِى كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8498'>بٍ‌ۖ ل</tajweed>َّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8499'>نس</tajweed>َى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla 'ilmuhā 'inda rabbī fī kitāb(in), lā yaḍillu rabbī wa lā yansā.
verses.translation: Про это знает мой Господь, - ответил Муса, - (И значится об этом) в Его Книге. Не ошибается Господь мой (никогда) И (ничего) не забывает

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّن نَّبَاتٍ شَتَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':87'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ مَهْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8500'>دًا و</tajweed>َسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8501'>اً و</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':91'>نز</tajweed>َلَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':64'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4278'>ءً ف</tajweed>َأَخْرَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4279'>جْ</tajweed>نَا بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8502'>جًا م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8503'>ِن ن</tajweed>َّبَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8504'>تٍ ش</tajweed>َتَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Al-lażī ja'ala lakumul-arḍa mahdaw wa salaka lakum fīhā subulaw wa anzala minas-samā'i mā'ā(n), fa akhrajnā bihī azwājam min nabātin syattā.
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто распростер вам землю колыбелью, По ней для вас дороги проложил, Низвел (обильно) воду с неба И ею в парах разные растения извел

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8505'>ٱ</tajweed>رْعَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَنْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مَكُمْ‌ۗ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ فِى ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ لَأَيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2495'>تٍ ل</tajweed>ِّأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8506'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُهَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kulū war'au an'āmakum, inna fī żālika la'āyātil li'ulin-nuhā.
verses.translation: Питайтесь и на ней стада свои пасите! Здесь, истинно, знамение для тех, Кто обладает разуменьем

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4250'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Minhā khalaqnākum wa fīhā nu'īdukum wa minhā nukhrijukum tāratan ukhrā.
verses.translation: Мы из (земли) вас сотворили, В нее же снова вас вернем И из нее вас изведем опять

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَرَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad araināhu āyātinā kullahā fa każżaba wa abā.
verses.translation: Мы все знаменья Наши показали (Фараону), - Он же отверг их, ложными считая

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla aji'tanā litukhrijanā min arḍinā bisiḥrika yā mūsā.
verses.translation: И сказал: "Не для того ли ты пришел, о Муса, Чтоб колдовством своим Изгнать нас со своей земли

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًا سُوًى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَنَأْتِيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ بِسِحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8507'>رٍ م</tajweed>ِّثْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7148'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7148'>جْ</tajweed>عَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8508'>دًا ل</tajweed>َّا نُخْلِفُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> نَحْنُ وَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ مَكَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8509'>نًا سُ</tajweed>وًى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa lana'tiyannaka bisiḥrim miṡlihī faj'al bainanā wa bainaka mau'idal lā nukhlifuhū naḥnu wa lā anta makānan suwā(n).
verses.translation: Но ведь и мы представить тебе можем Подобное же колдовство. Назначь для нас и для себя Условленное время встречи - Ни мы, ни ты его не переменим - На месте, (где мы будем) равные (возможности иметь)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًى
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8510'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زِّينَةِ وَأ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8511'>َن ي</tajweed>ُحْشَرَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8512'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ ضُحًى
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla mau'idukum yaumuz-zīnati wa ay yuḥsyaran-nāsu ḍuḥā(n).
verses.translation: (Муса) сказал: "День Украшения для вас - условленное время встречи, И пусть все люди соберутся к позднему утру

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَتَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa tawallā fir'aunu fa jama'a kaidahū ṡumma atā.
verses.translation: И удалился Фараон, И приготовил свои козни, И (поутру) явился (с ними)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6149'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':412'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ كَذِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8513'>بًا ف</tajweed>َيُسْحِتَك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8514'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِعَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8515'>بٍ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':387'>دْ</tajweed> خَابَ مَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8516'>ٱ</tajweed>فْتَرَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla lahum mūsā wailakum lā taftarū 'alallāhi każiban fa yusḥitakum bi'ażab(in), wa qad khāba maniftarā.
verses.translation: Муса сказал им: "Горе вам! Не измышляйте лжи против Аллаха, Иначе карой поразит Он вас. Ведь гибнут замыслы всех тех, Кто ложь возводит (на Аллаха)

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>زَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَمْرَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8517'>ُم ب</tajweed>َيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8518'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8519'>جْ</tajweed>وَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa tanāza'ū amrahum bainahum wa asarrun-najwā.
verses.translation: Они обговорили свое дело, Оставив в тайне обсуждение свое

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>نِ لَسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>نِ يُرِيدَانِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8520'>َن ي</tajweed>ُخْرِجَاك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8521'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَرْضِك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8522'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8523'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُثْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū in hāżāni lasāḥirāni yurīdāni ay yukhrijākum min arḍikum bisiḥrihimā wa yażhabā biṭarīqatikumul-muṡlā.
verses.translation: И молвили: "Они, конечно, оба - маги, И колдовством своим они хотят С вашей земли изгнать вас, - Тем самым на погибель обрекая Все лучшее в укладе вашей жизни

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6128'>جْ</tajweed>مِعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَيْدَكُمْ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8524'>ٱ</tajweed>ئْتُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> صَف<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8525'>ًّا‌ۚ و</tajweed>َقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':387'>دْ</tajweed> أَفْلَحَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8526'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ مَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8527'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَعْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ajmi'ū kaidakum ṡumma'tū ṣaffā(n), wa qad aflaḥal-yauma manista'lā.
verses.translation: Объедините замыслы свои, Сомкнитесь (плотным) рядом, - Сегодня будет счастлив тот, Кто верх одержит (в этом споре)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4922'>ن ت</tajweed>ُلْقِىَ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4923'>َن ن</tajweed>َّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū yā mūsā immā an tulqiya  wa immā an nakūna awwala man alqā.
verses.translation: (И далее) сказали: "О Муса, бросишь первым ты Иль будем мы бросать сначала

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۖ</tajweed> فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8528'>ن س</tajweed>ِحْرِهِمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا تَسْعَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla bal alqū, fa iżā ḥibāluhum wa 'iṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilaihi min siḥrihim annahā tas'ā.
verses.translation: Сказал он: "Нет! Вы первыми бросайте". И вот веревки их и жезлы - Как то почудилось ему - Под силою их чар пришли в движенье

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةً مُّوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> خِيفَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8529'>ةً م</tajweed>ُّوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa aujasa fī nafsihī khīfatam mūsā.
verses.translation: И страх вдруг душу Мусы охватил

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8530'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qulnā lā takhaf innaka antal-a'lā.
verses.translation: Сказали Мы: "Не бойся, (Муса)! Ведь, истинно, ты выше их

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed>‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا صَنَعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَيْدُ سَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8531'>رٍ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َلَا يُفْلِحُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8532'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa alqi mā fī yamīnika talqaf mā ṣana'ū, innamā ṣana'ū kaidu sāḥir(in), wa lā yufliḥus-sāḥiru ḥaiṡu atā.
verses.translation: Брось то, что держит твоя правая рука, - Он вмиг пожрет все то, Что чарами они произвели; Ведь все, что создали они, - Простая хитрость чародея, Но чародею счастья не найти, Куда бы он ни отправлялся

verses.text_uthmani: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأُلْقِىَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8533'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّحَرَةُ سُجَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8534'>دًا ق</tajweed>َال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ءَامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا بِرَبِّ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ulqiyas-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wa mūsā.
verses.translation: И были ниц повергнуты (В поклоне перед Мусой) чародеи И сказали: "Мы в Бога Мусы и Харуна Уверовали (всей душой)

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ ءَامَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':703'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَكَبِيرُكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8535'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8536'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّحْرَ‌ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':4933'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ خِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8537'>فٍ و</tajweed>َلَأُصَلِّبَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8538'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَيُّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَشَدُّ عَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8539'>بًا و</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8540'>بْ</tajweed>قَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla āmantum lahū qabla an āżana lakum, innahū lakabīrukumul-lażī 'allamakumus-siḥr(a), fa la'uqaṭṭi'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilāfiw wa la'uṣallibannakum fī jużū'in-nakhl(i), wa lata'lamunna ayyunā asyaddu 'ażābaw wa abqā.
verses.translation: И молвил Фараон: "В него уверовали раньше, Чем я согласие свое на это дал? Должно быть, он - у вас глава И научил вас колдовским (уловкам). Я накрест руки вам и ноги отсеку, Распну на пальмовых стволах, И вы узнаете тогда, Чья кара - (Бога Мусы иль моя) - Страшней и продолжительнее будет

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8541'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَنَا مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':816'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيِّنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4765'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى فَطَرَنَا‌ۖ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8542'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8542'>قْ</tajweed>ضِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ قَاضٍ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8543'>قْ</tajweed>ضِى هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8544'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَيَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':446'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّنْيَآ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū lan nu'ṡiraka 'alā mā jā'anā minal-bayyināti wal-lażī faṭaranā faqḍi mā anta qāḍ(in), innamā taqḍī hāżihil-ḥayātad-dun-yā.
verses.translation: Они ответили: "Тебя мы не поставим выше Знамений ясных, что пришли (к нам через них), - Выше Того, Кто сотворил нас. Решай же все, что ты решаешь, - Ведь простирается решение твое На (краткое мгновенье) этой жизни

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَا وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8545'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سِّحْرِ‌ۗ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8546'>رٌ و</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8540'>بْ</tajweed>قَىٰٓ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā āmannā birabbinā liyagfira lanā khaṭāyānā wa mā akrahtanā 'alaihi minas-siḥr(i), wallāhu khairuw wa abqā.
verses.translation: Уверовали в Господа мы нашего, Чтоб Он простил нам наши прегрешенья И колдовство, к которому ты нас принудил. Аллах ведь лучше (воздаянием) и вечностью (награды)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8547'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِ رَبَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8548'>جْ</tajweed>رِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8549'>مًا ف</tajweed>َإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innahū may ya'ti rabbahū mujriman fa inna lahū jahannam(a), lā yamūtu fīhā wa lā yaḥyā.
verses.translation: Ведь тот, Кто перед Господом своим в грехах предстанет, - Ад - для того, В котором он ни умирает, ни живет

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8550'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مُؤْمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8551'>نًا ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> عَمِلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8552'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ فَأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ لَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8553'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دَّرَجَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8554'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعُلَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa may ya'tihī mu'minan qad 'amilaṣ-ṣāliḥāti fa ulā'ika lahumud-darajātul-'ulā.
verses.translation: А тот, кто верным перед Ним предстанет, Имея за собой деяния благие, - Тем - высшая ступень (даров Господних)

verses.text_uthmani: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ عَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5720'>دْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8049'>نٍ ت</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':120'>جْ</tajweed>رِى مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':121'>ن ت</tajweed>َحْتِهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':122'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَنْهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ وَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8555'>ن ت</tajweed>َزَكَّىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Jannātu 'adnin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, wa żālika jazā'u man tazakkā.
verses.translation: Сады, реками омовенны, Где пребывать навечно им, - Такой награда будет тем, Кто (перед Господом) очищенным (предстанет)

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًا لَّا تَخَـٰفُ دَرَكًا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَوْحَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8556'>ٱ</tajweed>ضْرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8556'>بْ</tajweed> لَهُمْ طَرِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8557'>قًا ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':837'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَحْرِ يَبَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8558'>سًا ل</tajweed>َّا تَخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فُ دَرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8559'>كًا و</tajweed>َلَا تَخْشَىٰ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad auḥainā ilā mūsā an asri bi'ibādī faḍrib lahum ṭarīqan fil-baḥri yabasā(n), lā takhāfu darakaw wa lā takhsyā.
verses.translation: Внушением Мы Мусе (повелели): "Выйди со слугами Моими ночью И проложи им сушей путь чрез море. Погони (Фараона) не страшись И (ничего) не бойся

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَغَشِيَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8560'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8561'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa atba'ahum fir'aunu  bijunūdihī fa gasyiyahum minal-yammi mā gasyiyahum.
verses.translation: И Фараон погнался им вослед с войсками, Но в море их покрыло то, Чему (было повелено) покрыть их

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
